verb.description: Describe the distinctive nature or features of.
examples: the historian characterized the period as the decade of revolution

verb.description: (of a feature or quality) be typical or characteristic of.
examples: the disease is characterized by weakening of the immune system

origin: Late 16th century (in the sense engrave, inscribe): from French caractériser or medieval Latin characterizare, from Greek kharaktērizein, from kharaktēr a stamping tool.
